name: Collapsar
overview: Published in GO64! 2003/10, this is a Uridium style horizontal shooter. Based in the year 2050, several space stations were build by a famous astronaut known as John Brendan and his crew. They spent over 40 years building and repairing a load of space stations, and galaxy warps. However, a problem awaits. Unfortunately John and his crew had passed away in 2026 due to some life-threatening conflict from alien forces. Now those aliens are poised to take over the entire galaxy and destroy all living planets with a beam ray. NATSA is aware of the situation and how doomed Earth is. The President of the United States has sent an intercom message to NATSA to train all the employees for a life-changing mission. All trainees except for five had failed the test. The 4 who passed the exams have been sent to the space rocket, and shot off into space. They land on the planet X. Their mission, to infiltrate all the aliens who guard the planet. Armed with a pulsar ray you can take them out and move through the galaxy warps to free other space stations.
